item.title: Fortinet Patches Critical FortiWLM Vulnerability
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Fortinet has released patches for a critical-severity path traversal vulnerability in FortiWLM that was reported last year.

The post Fortinet Patches Critical FortiWLM Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Industry Moves for the week of December 16, 2024 - SecurityWeek
item.description: Explore industry moves and significant changes in the industry for the week of December 16, 2024. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and shifts.

item.title: SandboxAQ Raises $300 Million at $5.3 Billion Valuation
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Alphabet spinoff SandboxAQ has announced raising $300 million in funding at a valuation of $5.3 billion.

The post SandboxAQ Raises $300 Million at $5.3 Billion Valuation  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Chrome 131 Update Patches High-Severity Memory Safety Bugs
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Google has released a Chrome 131 update to patch multiple high-severity memory safety vulnerabilities, including three affecting the V8 JavaScript engine.

The post Chrome 131 Update Patches High-Severity Memory Safety Bugs appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Juniper Warns of Mirai Botnet Targeting Session Smart Routers
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Juniper Networks says a Mirai botnet is ensnaring session smart router devices that are using default passwords.

The post Juniper Warns of Mirai Botnet Targeting Session Smart Routers appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Bureau Raises $30M to Tackle Deepfakes, Payment Fraud
item.dc:creator: SecurityWeek News
item.description:
San Francisco startup scores a Series B round to thwart money mule accounts, deep-fake identities, account takeovers and payment fraud.

The post Bureau Raises $30M to Tackle Deepfakes, Payment Fraud appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Recorded Future Tagged as ‘Undesirable’ in Russia
item.dc:creator: Ryan Naraine
item.description:
The Russian government accuses the US threat-intel firm of participating in the collection and analysis of data on the actions of the Russia's armed forces. 

The post Recorded Future Tagged as ‘Undesirable’ in Russia appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Regional Care Data Breach Impacts 225,000 People
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Healthcare insurance firm Regional Care has disclosed a data breach impacting more than 225,000 individuals.

The post Regional Care Data Breach Impacts 225,000 People appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Watch Now: Navigating Your OT Cybersecurity Journey: From Assessment to Implementation
item.dc:creator: SecurityWeek News
item.description:
Learn how to develop a holistic solution that provides you and your team the power to mitigate cyber threats effectively within your OT environment.

The post Watch Now: Navigating Your OT Cybersecurity Journey: From Assessment to Implementation appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: CISA Issues Binding Operational Directive for Improved Cloud Security
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
CISA’s Binding Operational Directive 25-01 requires federal agencies to align cloud environments with SCuBA secure configuration baselines.

The post CISA Issues Binding Operational Directive for Improved Cloud Security appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: BeyondTrust Patches Critical Vulnerability Discovered During Security Incident Probe
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
A critical vulnerability in BeyondTrust Privileged Remote Access and Remote Support could lead to arbitrary command execution.

The post BeyondTrust Patches Critical Vulnerability Discovered During Security Incident Probe appeared first on SecurityWeek.
